Trade/Device Name(s): Prodigy® AutoCode® Eject Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Prodigy® AutoCode® Eject Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Prodigy AutoCode Eject Blood Glucose Monitoring System and No Coding Test Strips for self-testing of glucose levels in capillary whole blood
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertips and alternative sites for self-testing at home by people with diabetes, as an aid to monitor effectiveness of diabetes control; not for diagnosis, screening for diabetes, or neonatal use.
